content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "blackstone_wall", "quantity": 23, "index": 17}, {"type": "cat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 25}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 26}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 7, "index": 27}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 47, "index": 38}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 20, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a blue_stained_glass, I need to craft 8 glasses and 1 blue_dye. The blue dye can be crafted from 1 lapis_lazuli which can be obtained by smelting the lapis_block at slot 16. However, since there is no empty slot available, I will first craft one of the glasses by smelting the sand at slot 12.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 11 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "blackstone_wall", "quantity": 23, "index": 17}, {"type": "cat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "green_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 25}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 26}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 7, "index": 27}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 47, "index": 38}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 20, "index": 45}]

Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 13 with quantity 1
